_header: Jesu God Son of mights most
_description: Gospel for Fifth (?) Sunday after Octave of Epiphany, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Ihesu godsun of mightes masteIn uertu of þe haly gaste…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …On þis wise oure louerd þareTurned þe folk to trow his lare
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Egressus iesu crist in uirtute spiritus.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica v post octava Epiphanie Euangelium secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 36vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.298-303.
